column3: Etymologies}}, p. 376</ref> in [[Quenya]]. It has been suggested that the word would appear as ''nendë'' in the Quenya form of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref>Petri Tikka, "[http://www.petritikka.com/elvish/PE17.html Quenya words in Parma Eldalambaron 17]" at [http://www.petritikka.com/elvish/ Men Eldalambínen] (accessed 21 January 2010)</ref>
